info.title: Cloud4Log API v3
info.description:
The v3 API for cloud4log.com.

This is the new version of the Cloud4Log API with improved pagination, enhanced features, and better performance.

If you have valid login credentials you can start right away by using the button "Authorize". You can then start to call the API. The login request will respond with a organisation side-ID. You need this and ID for most of the requests, for example upload a delivery note into the sites delivery note pool: POST /organization-sites/{organizationSiteKey}/delivery-notes/pdf/{fileName}.

For Information about your current user see /me endpoint. The technical keys of the application are referenced as "_key" (For example the deliveryNoteKey is referenced as _key on GET /organization-sites/{organizationSiteKey}/carrier/delivery-notes).

Endpoints can appear multiple times, when they have more than one tag. See this Github repository to import the API directly into swagger and to see releases and changelogs: https://github.com/JR-2022/C4L

get.description:
Get delivery note bundles for carrier with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch delivery note bundles from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of carrier delivery note bundles with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get delivery notes for carrier with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch delivery notes from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of carrier delivery notes with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get tours for carrier with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch tours from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of carrier tours with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get delivery note bundles for consignee with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch delivery note bundles from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of consignee delivery note bundles with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get delivery notes for consignee with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch delivery notes from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of consignee delivery notes with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get tours for consignee with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch tours from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of consignee tours with enhanced pagination info

get.description:
Get delivery note bundles for consignor with enhanced pagination and sorting.
Supports improved performance with pagination parameters.
Can fetch bundles from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of consignor delivery note bundles with enhanced pagination info

get.summary: Get consignor delivery notes data w/o load carriers (v3)
get.description:
Get delivery notes metadata from delivery note pool.
Property loadCarriers is always an empty array. To get the
load carriers please use the load carriers endpoint.
Supports enhanced pagination and sorting with improved performance.
Can fetch delivery notes from multiple sites using the organizationSiteKeys query parameter.

200.description: body contains list of delivery notes metadata with enhanced pagination info

post.description:
Create a new user and add this user to the organization and the given organization sites
and equip the new user with permissions according to the given roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the new user is added.

204.description: The user was create and added to the organization

post.summary: Create new user for organization sites
post.description:
Create a new user and add this user to the organization for the specified organization sites
and equip the new user with the rights according to the specified roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization sites to which the new user is to be added.
The new user can have only the roles carrier, consignee, consignor, site_admin.

204.description: The user was create and added to the organization

put.summary: Edit user with new site roles/permissions (v3)
put.description:
Edit a existing user and add this user to the given organization sites
and equip the new user with permissions according to the given roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the user is added.
All previously set permissions and linked sites are removed.
All sites and roles to be set must be passed.

204.description: The user was edited and got new permissions

delete.summary: Delete a user from the organization
delete.description: Deletes the specified user from Keycloak and the organization.

put.summary: Edit user with new site roles/permissions (v3)
put.description:
Edit a existing user and add this user to the given organization sites
and equip the new user with permissions according to the given roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization sites the user is added.
All previously set permissions and linked sites are removed.
All sites and roles to be set must be passed.
The optional submitted password is ignored.
The user can have only the roles carrier, consignee, consignor, site_admin.

204.description: The user was edited and got new permissions

post.description:
Creates a new API client for the organization and the given organization sites.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the API client belongs to.
By creating an api client you agree that this api client is only used in accordance with the terms of service of this application.

get.summary: retrieves a list of API clients
get.description:
Retrieves a list of API clients for the organization.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the API clients belong to.

get.summary: Get a receipts file as consignor.
get.description: Get a single receipt file for a delivery note as consignor. The bundle must be in status 'closed'.

get.summary: Get all receipt metadata for a delivery note
get.description: Get a list of receipt metadata for a single delivery note as consignor. The bundle must be in status 'closed'.

get.summary: Get a receipts file as carrier.
get.description: Get a single receipt file for a delivery note as carrier. The bundle must be in status 'closed'.

get.summary: Get all receipt metadata for a delivery note as carrier.
get.description: Get a list of receipt metadata for a single delivery note as carrier. The bundle must be in status 'closed'.

get.summary: Get a receipts file as consignee.
get.description: Get a single receipt file for a delivery note as consignee.

get.summary: Get all receipt metadata for a delivery note as consignee.
get.description: Get a list of receipt metadata for a single delivery note as consignee.

patch.summary: Update the reference number of a delivery note bundle
patch.description:
This will overwrite all of the existing reference numbers on the
delivery notes linked to this bundle. Use the
'carrierAccessToken' if the bundle is in status
'open'. This makes it possible to update the reference number before
the checkout has been finished. Use the 'accessToken' if the
bundle is in status 'sent'.
The 'carrierAccessToken' is generated when creating the
signature pad for checkout. The 'accessToken' is generated
when finishing the checkout of the delivery note bundle.

204.description: The reference number was updated successfully

patch.summary: Update the reference number of a tour
patch.description:
This will overwrite all of the existing reference numbers on the
delivery notes linked to this tour. You need to pass the
'accessToken' as query parameter. The 'accessToken' is generated
when finishing the checkout of the tour.

204.description: The reference number was updated successfully

delete.description:
Delete a organization. The organization is first deactivated and
after 10 weeks deleted.

204.description: The Organization was marked for deletion.

put.description:
Request the email for password change. Keycloak will send an email
to the user with a link to change the password.

post.summary: Change email address and request verification codes.
post.description:
Starts the two-factor email change flow.
A verification code will be sent to the current email address,
and another one to the new email address. Both codes must later
be provided to confirm the change.

Completes the two-factor email change flow.
Requires the 6-digit code sent to the current email address and
the 6-digit code sent to the new email address.

post.summary: Create a new webhook for the organization
post.description:
Create a new webhook for the organization.
Currently only the webhook event type "reference_number_updated" is officially supported.

200.description: The webhook was created for the organization

get.summary: Get all webhooks for the organization
get.description: Get all webhooks for the organization

200.description: List of webhooks for the organization

post.summary: Rotate the secret of a webhook for the organization
post.description: Rotate the secret of a webhook for the organization. The old secret will no longer be valid.

200.description: The secret of the webhook was rotated.

delete.summary: Delete a webhook for the organization
delete.description: Delete a webhook for the organization

DeliveryNotesFilterProperties.description: Common filter properties for delivery notes across all roles

DeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProperties.description: Common filter properties for delivery note bundles

CarrierDeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProperti.description: Filter properties specific to carrier delivery note bundles (includes carrierNameOutgoing)

ToursFilterProperties.description: Common filter properties for tours across carrier and consignee roles

public.description: Whether the client is public or confidential

m2m.description: True if confidential client is M2M, null for public clients

redirectUris.description: Redirect URIs, empty for M2M clients

webOrigins.description: Web origins, empty for M2M clients

clientSecret.description: Secret for confidential clients, null for public

BinaryFileType.description: data that is encoded as binary data

accessSiteKey.description: Key of the organization site that provides access to this delivery note
Key of the organization site that provides access to this delivery note

OriginalConsignorGln.description: 13 digit GLN number. Can be empty if no GLN is available.

accessSiteKey.description: Key of the organization site that provides access to this bundle
Key of the organization site that provides access to this tour

secret.description: Secret to be used to verify webhook payloads

Token64LengthType.description: Token with length 64. Used in different requests.

OrganizationPermissionsType.description: all organization permissions. If set to true user has this permission for the organization

administration_users_delete.description: This permission is needed to delete a user from the calling user's organization

administration_webhooks_create.description: This permission is needed to create webhooks for the organization

administration_webhooks_list.description: This permission is needed to list all webhooks for the organization

administration_webhooks_delete.description: This permission is needed to delete webhooks for the organization

OrganizationSitePermissionsType.description: all organization site permissions. If set to true user has this permission for the organization site

administration_organization_sites_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying the site of an organization

administration_organization_sites_remote.description: This permission is needed to authorize remote sites to access a site
This permissions is needed to get a list with all remote sites that have access to this site
This permission is needed to remove authorization of remote sites to access a site

This permission is needed to create a users for a organization site
This permission is needed to modify a users for a organization site

administration_report_load_carriers_csv_.description: This permission is needed to get the load carriers report as csv

administration_organization_sites_self_c.description: This permission is needed to get the self checkin configuration
This permission is needed to modify the self checkin configuration
This permission is needed to create a new self checkin token
This permission is needed to read all self checkin tokens
This permission is needed to delete a self checkin token

paginationLimitParam.name: limit
paginationLimitParam.description: Maximum number of items to return

organizationSiteKeysParam.name: organizationSiteKeys
organizationSiteKeysParam.description: Array of organization site keys to fetch data from (max 10). If provided, overrides the path parameter.

paginationBundleSortByParam.name: sortBy
paginationBundleSortByParam.description: Field to sort by for bundles

paginationTourSortByParam.name: sortBy
paginationTourSortByParam.description: Field to sort by for tours

consignorDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyPara.name: filterProperty
consignorDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyPara.description: Field to filter consignor delivery notes by

carrierDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyParam.name: filterProperty
carrierDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyParam.description: Field to filter carrier delivery notes by

consigneeDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyPara.name: filterProperty
consigneeDeliveryNotesFilterPropertyPara.description: Field to filter consignee delivery notes by

consignorDeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProper.name: filterProperty
consignorDeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProper.description: Field to filter consignor delivery note bundles by

carrierDeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProperty.name: filterProperty

consigneeDeliveryNoteBundlesFilterProper.name: filterProperty

carrierToursFilterPropertyParam.name: filterProperty

consigneeToursFilterPropertyParam.name: filterProperty

paginationFilterClosedParam.name: filterNotClosed
paginationFilterClosedParam.description: Filter for not closed items only (bundles, tours, delivery notes)

filterOnlyDiscrepanciesParam.name: filterOnlyDiscrepancies
filterOnlyDiscrepanciesParam.description: If true, only return bundles where at least one delivery note has a discrepancy (normal or fine). Uses the bundle.discrepancies flag for efficient filtering.
